creditline: The Mary Griggs Burke Endowment Fund established by the Mary Livingston Griggs and Mary Griggs Burke Foundation
medium: Hanging scroll, ink and color on silk
text: Standing man with long beard and hat, dressed in a garment tied at his belly. He has a sword in one hand and in the other is holding up a bag that contains two demons.
title: Shōki, the Demon Queller
